text1
That t-shirt was the uniform we wore when we took over this area!
「そのTシャツはこの地域を占領する際のユニフォーム！」
「그 티셔츠는, 이 지역을 점령할 때 사용했던 유니폼!」
That t-shirt was the uniform we wore when we took over this area!
「那T恤是我們在佔領這個大廳時所使用的制服！」
「那T恤是我們在佔領這個大廳時所使用的制服！」
That t-shirt was the uniform we wore when we took over this area!
text2

I haven't seen you before. So you are a newbie.

text2_1
Hee-hee-hee! This game belongs to us from now on!
